attributes.comment:
I am writing to oppose this increase. I am a potential adoptive parent, trying
to adopt from Uzbekistan. We are in the beginning process and are trying to go
through the financing right now, since it is very expensive, around $25k total
for this country. The fee increase will only make it harder for us to adopt,
which is not in the best interest of the children at need of families. This is
something that can discourage potential parents financially of adopting a child.
Not to mention that often times the whole adoption wait time is greater than 18
months and we would have to apply again and pay the filing fee again!

Please help us and do not increase this fee.

Thank you!
Melissa
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melissa Morgan
